Text.Page:
(A document next to the priest's body shows the runes necessary to create a magical sanctuary here.)

(The runes purport to be able to ward off the gulas. The plans aren't complete, however.)

Such a tragic sacrifice, but the effort to ward off the gulas might pay dividends after all. I sense real power in these plans.

There weren't any runestones lying around where you found these plans, were there?

Too bad. I bet the gulas thought they were shiny jewels and looted them. Looting from the deadâ€”how distasteful!
